range.description: The range of unicode characters to load

first.description: First character in the range. Should be greater or equal to 32, which is the default

last.description: Last character in the range. Should be greater or equal to 32. Defaults to 255.

pixelSize.description: The vertical resolution for the generated MSDF bitmaps. It isn't necessarily the actual height of the glyphs, but is used as a scaling factor from normalized EM units to pixels.

fontFile.description: Path to the font file to load

textureFile.description: Optional path to the atlas texture file. If not provided, the texture will be generated at load time.

items.description: Information about a specific glyph: codepoint, bounding box, UVs etc

codepoint.description: The unicode codepoint of the glyph

advance.description: The horizontal advance, in EM units

index.description: The internal glyph index within the font

offset.description: The offset between in the current pen position and the glyph's origin, in EMs

uv.description: The UV rectangle, in pixel coordinates
